positive_examples: This is an example of access control.
The access control demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed access control in this context.
A typical case of access control would involve these features.
The concept of access control applies here.
A security operation managing and regulating entry to or exit from restricted areas, facilities, or resources.
negative_examples: This is an example of security patrol, not access control.
This represents security operation in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: SecurityPatrol, or other types of SecurityOperation

definition: Security measures that regulate who can view or use resources in a system.
